text: Rari vhɨrvera vhɨzgim, Zudaiŋ Fhe Bakɨme mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzgi ne nzuav, mbe Zudaiŋ ne ndɨkndɨgap, mbe thamthagi tuga bakɨme vhɨra vhɨzgim, mbasɨk phuri guigira mbatɨgi, maaŋ muuŋgiap Por khaŋ mbe nzuai,27.9 Kha tuga bakɨme, ana Fhe Bakɨme mba gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzgi tuk ma. Ndu Wok Pris sapta 23.26-32 kegɨp ganɨ ŋgɨp ves. Mba tugivigen bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ bakɨme Mediterenian mbasɨga bakɨmen khavi tugivige ma. Mba tugivigen, ŋkee rui fhu.
